title: So...Kennen update?
body:
Kennen just isn't fun to play against, and his model looks bad by today's standards.

There's an old adage "Kennen doesn't lose lane. Or win it." If he's in trouble, he gets a GIANT speed boost and runs away. If he's on the offensive, he doesn't have a range indicator on his W (as opposed to Twitch) so it's kind of a guessing game. His ultimate is the best part of his kit.

I think he really needs attention. Warwick is playable. Even Gangplank is better off than Kennen.

replies.body:
I agree he could use a few QoL changes like the range indicator on W like you mentioned.

But first, a visual update. He looks like a bean bag with a rubber band on the center.

I also thinks he needs a minor kit redesign, as his E is one of the worst abilities in the game to play against.

It's so hard to kill a Kennen because he can just instantly get away.
